item.title: Trophy Awards | Maximize Vendor Relationships | Episode #2
item.description:
Thomas Busch from www.TrophyAwards.com gives you step by step insructions on how to maximize your vendor relations.
From how to break the ice with new vendors, to handling mistakes when they happen - Tom pulls back the curtain of his million dollar demeanor that has made him a hit with vendors around the world.
To find out more about Trophy Awards, Inc visit their website at www.TrophyAwards.com
item.dc:creator: Tom Busch

item.title: Trophy Awards| Meet Tom Busch| Episode #1
item.description:
In the inaugural Trophy Awards podcast,Tom Busch discusses how his family rescued a business with $100,000 in sales and turned it into a $3 million success story.
Tom also talks about the importance of placing the customer first and how blessed he is to be working in an awesome industry with a first-class team.
For more information on how Trophy Awards can help your company, head on over to www.TrophyAwards.com.
